title: .NET
subtext: Free, open source developer platform based on C#
author: patrickpiedad

description.title: .NET
texts: .NET is a free, open-source developer platform created by Microsoft. It provides a framework for building, deploying, and running a wide range of applications, including web, mobile, desktop, gaming, and Internet of Things (IoT) applications.

.NET is based on the strongly typed, type-safe C# programming language. It has multiple variants with the most modern variant being .NET (Core) with it's yearly releases designated by version number (ie. .NET 8.0).
